channel.title: Comments on: Oraimo OF-KK30 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Review
channel.description: Web Ã— Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/oraimo-of-kk30-wireless-keyboard-and-mouse-review/#comment-1276">Ebube</a>.
No. It is just there to let you know when battery levels goes low. Remember that you'd have to replace it with brand new batteries as they are not rechargeable.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ebube.

No. It is just there to let you know when battery levels goes low. Remember that you’d have to replace it with brand new batteries as they are not rechargeable.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/oraimo-of-kk30-wireless-keyboard-and-mouse-review/#comment-1304">Yetunde</a>.
Yes, it has rendered it useless. You can just buy another one, However. The exact model. At least you know you could always swap keyboards or mouse if any of them goes bad. But that's if you like it that much.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Yetunde.

Yes, it has rendered it useless. You can just buy another one, However. The exact model. At least you know you could always swap keyboards or mouse if any of them goes bad. But that’s if you like it that much.

item.title: By: Yetunde
item.dc:creator: Yetunde
item.description: Hi! I got this wireless mouse and keyboard and the nano receiver broke. How can I fix this? Because I know this will render both the mouse and keyboard useless
item.content:encoded: Hi! I got this wireless mouse and keyboard and the nano receiver broke. How can I fix this? Because I know this will render both the mouse and keyboard useless

item.title: By: Ebube
item.dc:creator: Ebube
item.description: I see a battery bar next to the numlock and caps lock. Is there a way to check this or turn that on to know the battery percentage remaining or something
item.content:encoded: I see a battery bar next to the numlock and caps lock. Is there a way to check this or turn that on to know the battery percentage remaining or something

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/oraimo-of-kk30-wireless-keyboard-and-mouse-review/#comment-1197">Fac</a>.
No. Not at all.. Just curious, why do you think anyone would need a USB port on the keyboard.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Fac.

No. Not at all.. Just curious, why do you think anyone would need a USB port on the keyboard.

item.title: By: Fac
item.dc:creator: Fac
item.description: Is there any usb port on the keyboard?
item.content:encoded: Is there any usb port on the keyboard?

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/oraimo-of-kk30-wireless-keyboard-and-mouse-review/#comment-671">Chibueze Chima</a>.
No, I do not have a Youtube Channel and I am not willing to do that any time soon. Let me know what else you would like to find out. Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Chibueze Chima.

No, I do not have a Youtube Channel and I am not willing to do that any time soon. Let me know what else you would like to find out. Thanks.

item.title: By: Chibueze Chima
item.dc:creator: Chibueze Chima
item.description: Can you please post a video-based review of the oraimo SmartOffice Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo?
item.content:encoded: Can you please post a video-based review of the oraimo SmartOffice Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo?
